attributes.action: Allow voting via E-VOTES on issues relating to parliamentary bills by the general public to make them law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would give 'true' democratic status to new and existing laws.

Technology now exists for this type of modern democracy to decide the future of our Country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
